summary: My first mod, an Argonian tank follower
descriptionHtml:
Hello Everyone! This is my first mod and first follower! He's an Argonian Mercenary, currently under contract with the empire. 
He can be found in The Winking Skeever in Solitude, probably naked (to clothe, just ask to trade with him).
He comes with a full set of imperial gear, but it's not bound to him, so he can wear whatever you'd like him to. He's proficient with a sword/shield, archery, and even some conjuration, as well as heavy armor. 
He will also scale with your character all the way up to level 100, and his minimum is 15. 
Please Enjoy!
author: DjOtterPop
